#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Implementation

= Quick Start=

  # Download the NETOpenIDSelector Control
  # Add a reference to the control in your website
  # Add the Control to your Toolbox
  # Drag the NETOpenIDSelector Control to your page, and you will get the following:
{{{
<OpenIDSelector:NETOpenIDSelector ID="NETOpenIDSelector1" runat="server" LoadjQuery="true" />
}}}
  # In your code behind, add the following callback:
{{{
protected void Selected(object sender, ProviderChosenEventArgs selector)
{
    string url = selector.SelectorURL;
}
}}}
  # Finally, set the OnSelectorChosen event to handle your callback, from the page:
{{{
<OpenIDSelector:NETOpenIDSelector ID="NETOpenIDSelector1" runat="server" LoadjQuery="true" OnSelectorChosen="Selected" />
}}}
